attributes.action: Covid-19 optional absence for students who suffer from underlying health issues
attributes.additional_details: As the media has informed us it could have a detrimental effect on those already suffering from underlying conditions.
attributes.background: Regarding covid-19 we should allow an optional absence for students who suffer from underlying health problems, eg. Asthma. As we know covid-19 is a respiratory virus and it could pose a threat to those with respiratory problems.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has announced the closure of schools and colleges. You can read more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/schools-colleges-and-early-years-settings-to-close 

The Government has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
